title: Publisher Rocket Reaction | Brand New Updates

tactics.name: Color Coding for Keyword Analysis
tactics.description: Uses green/yellow/red color codes to assess keyword viability based on search volume and competition
steps: Analyze keywords using color coding system
Prioritize green keywords with high search volume
Avoid red keywords with low search volume
caveats: Does not account for niche-specific demand
source_quotes: this color coding is huge huge

tactics.name: Keyword Refinement with More Info Button
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket's 'more information' button to iteratively remove words from keyword searches and find viable niches.
steps: Remove last word from search phrase
Run new search with remaining terms
caveats: May not work for extremely niche topics
source_quotes: if you put kids books about adoption in your title... competitive score is only eight

tactics.name: Export Analyzed Data Only
tactics.description: Export only the analyzed keywords from Publisher Rocket to avoid irrelevant data in export files.
source_quotes: you can actually export this to excel... only export analyze

tactics.name: leverage_free_tools
tactics.description: share free tools to enhance self-publishing business
caveats: when tools fail to deliver expected results
source_quotes: share 10 free tools to help you in your self-publishing business

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Threshold
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 50, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: the lower the number the better your chances

heuristics.name: Prioritize Low Competitive Score Niches
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 10, prioritize for new authors
source_quotes: competitive score is only eight which means you got a really good chance

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_titles
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting
source_quotes: youtube picked out just for you

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket's competitive score considers keyword placement, author recognition, and book age
source_quotes: what this takes into account in addition to a lot of other things is whether that keyword phrase is in the title... how old those other books are

claims.statement: Children's books about adoption have an average monthly search volume of 31 pages
source_quotes: kids books about adoption average 31 pages

claims.statement: youtube recommends videos based on user preferences
source_quotes: youtube picked out just for you

niche_patterns.description: Targets specific audience segments with unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (teen boys), problem (ADHD), and constraint (Christian) for niche differentiation
source_quotes: don't let that scare you... the closer to one the better
